entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Use Source Generators in default DependencyInjector #82679
  • Clean up some inconsistencies in test .proj files #82677
  • Dotnet stopped working on Arm64 based Rockchip RK3566 #82672
  • hostfxr_initialize_for_runtime_config fails with error code 0x80008093 #82670
  • SystemTextJson UnmappedJsonProperty error message not correct #82668
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfEqual and ThrowIfNotEqual #82667
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource create/start root activity #82673
  • System.Text.Json source generators are not improving deserialize performance #82626
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!arg->OperIsPutArg()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #82654
    8.0.0
  • Support marshalled delegates with NativeAOT on iOS platforms #82090
    8.0.0
  • [Windows|Arm32] Native varargs unsupported by the platform #12979
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbNext->bbJumpDest->bbFlags & BBF_FINALLY_TARGET' #82275
    8.0.0
  • Xion cooper #82656
  • Formatting a decimal using CultureInfo nb-NB produces differing output depending on platform. #82631
  • Jit can generate pointless movs #10315
    8.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException while debugging unit test #81148
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add guard around mini_is_gsharedvt_inst call #82678
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • pal_console.c: cast TIOCSWINSZ to int when `HAVE_IOCTL_WITH_INT_REQUEST` #82676
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove unused AOTMode msbuild property. #82675
  • [jiterp] cmpxchg opcodes are supported #82674
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix Json unmapped member error msg #82669
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable JitDasmWithAlignmentBoundaries and JitDasmWithAddress in Release #82666
  • Typo in DeniedValuesAttribute #82665
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    community-contribution
  • move fence to the right place #82661
    area-GC-coreclr
  • update Alpine image #82660
  • Bump main PreReleaseVersionIteration to 3 #82658
    area-Infrastructure
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
  • [wasm] CI: trigger wasm jobs on internal linker changes #82655
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [JIT] Fixed regression for `AND(X, CNS(-1))` lowering optimization #82659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thunk page generation and mapping for iOS-like platforms #82317
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Provide more information to the user about the usage of MonoPInvokeCallback #82653
    community-contribution
  • Add runtime file version to RuntimeInfo #82648
  • JIT: fix finally target flags after some flow graph updates #82623
  • Add CA 2021 into CodeAnalysis config #82649
    area-Meta
  • Update GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #82647
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Icon(Stream) handling of partial reads #82621
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix SoundPlayer handling of partial reads on streams #82612
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
  • Replace IlcHostArch with SDK-computed value #82645
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Emit llvm intrinsic declarations lazily. #82519
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • [wasm] Add a GC lock API and deprecate it #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Track down analyzer failure #82615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
